#### [Artemis I Path to the Pad: The Rocket](https://plus.nasa.gov/video/artemis-i-path-to-the-pad-the-rocket/)

Watch documentary footage of our Space Launch System (SLS) rocket’s transformation into the over-300-foot-tall launch vehicle that will return humanity to the Moon.

#### [Artemis I Path to the Pad: The Spacecraft](https://plus.nasa.gov/video/artemis-i-path-to-the-pad-the-spacecraft/)

Watch as teams at NASA’s Kennedy Space Center prepare Orion for that journey, outfitting the spacecraft with its necessary components as it moves along its path to the pad.

Watch SLS and Orion continue on their path to the pad as they travel to Kennedy Space Center’s Launch Pad 39B for a full countdown rehearsal – an operation involving \[…\]

metadata.og:description: Through Artemis, NASA will once again land humans on the Moon Join us as we document this moment in history and watch as we follow SLS and Orion on their path
